pages.text: The Reaped mod allows you to take on the mantle of the grim reaper! Crafting a scythe and some reaper garbs will increase your chances of beheading a mob when killed.
The infernal scythe is a powerful weapon and necessary tool for any reaper. Pairing it with reaper armor will increase the chance of decapitating a mob.
Wearing reaper armor will increase the decapitation chance of the scythe by 5%. If you have the full armor set equipped you will also get a speed buff.
